languages.text: "И так и должно быть. Ты можешь хотя бы отдаленно понять мои чувства, элантах... чего не скажешь о твоих примитивных сородичах".
"As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."
languages.original_text: "И так и должно быть. Ты можешь хотя бы отдаленно понять мои чувства, элантах... чего не скажешь о твоих примитивных сородичах".

traits.locale_text: "And rightly so. You can at least remotely understand my feelings, elantach... which can't be said about your primitive kinsmen."
"And rightly so. You can at least remotely understand my feelings, elantach... which can't be said about your primitive kinsmen."
"As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."
"As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."
"As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

languages.text: “你确实应该这么觉得。你至少应该能够体会我的感受，外界人……但你那些野蛮的同类可不这样想。”
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

traits.locale_text: “你确实应该这么觉得。你至少应该能够体会我的感受，外界人……但你那些野蛮的同类可不这样想。”

languages.text: «Es lógico. Al menos tú tienes una mínima comprensión de mis sentimientos, elantach... que ya es más de lo que puede decirse de tus primitivos congéneres».
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

traits.locale_text: «Es lógico. Al menos tú tienes una mínima comprensión de mis sentimientos, elantach... que ya es más de lo que puede decirse de tus primitivos congéneres».

languages.text: « C'est tout naturel. Vous, au moins, semblez comprendre un tant soit peu mes sentiments, elantach... contrairement à vos primitifs semblables. »
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout naturel. Vous, au moins, semblez comprendre un tant soit peu mes sentiments, elantach... contrairement à vos primitifs semblables. »

languages.text: "So sollte es auch sein. Ihr habt wenigstens eine ungefähre Vorstellung von meinen Gefühlen, Elantach ... was man von Euren primitiven Artgenossen nicht behaupten kann."
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

traits.locale_text: "So sollte es auch sein. Ihr habt wenigstens eine ungefähre Vorstellung von meinen Gefühlen, Elantach ... was man von Euren primitiven Artgenossen nicht behaupten kann."

languages.text: 「そうあるべきだ。少なくともエランタ、お前は我の気持ちを幾分かは理解している…それはお前の原始的な同族に対しては言えないことだ」
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

traits.locale_text: 「そうあるべきだ。少なくともエランタ、お前は我の気持ちを幾分かは理解している…それはお前の原始的な同族に対しては言えないことだ」

languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."

languages.text: "Öyle olmalı zaten. En azından sen biraz da olsa duygularımı anlayabiliyorsun elantach... İlkel soydaşların için aynısını söyleyemem."
languages.original_text: "As you should be. You, at least, have some faint understanding of my feelings, elantach... which cannot be said for your primitive kin."
